messages.title: Why I'm voting Green: Thoughts of a first-time voter
messages.content: In the last twelve months, opinion polls have continuously put the Green Party at the top of the list of parties for the 18-24 age group. Amy Wright, a first-time voter, shares her reasons for voting Green, highlighting values alignment, family, and the party being a serious contender amongst young voters.

messages.title: Green Surge in the East
messages.content: Membership of the Green Party in Britain has started to surge since the confrontation with the EU. The membership in the East has alone grown by over 600%. The growth is particularly notable in constituencies like Broxbourne and Harlow where it has quadrupled, and in areas such as Stevenage and Chelmsford where the party stands a real chance to influence.

messages.title: Greens Offer Positive Vision for a Fairer Future
messages.content: The Green Party has a vision for a fairer and more sustainable society, emphasizing the need for better public transport, more affordable housing, a health environment, better public services, and a NHS in public hands.

messages.title: Green Party's Largest Campaign
messages.content: The Green Party will run its biggest ever election campaign this coming General Election, with a target to stand in 75% of constituencies around England and looking for candidates in Hertford, South Cambridgeshire, Milton Keynes, and Essex, with an emphasis on North East Hertfordshire.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Green Party wants to institute better public transport.
The party advocates for more affordable housing to improve livelihoods.
Commitment to a healthier environment is a key policy.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: A better NHS in public hands
keyPolicies.policyDescription: They aim to ensure that the NHS is kept in public hands.
There is a goal to provide better public services under the Green Party's agenda.

issues.brexitEurope: Membership of the Green Party in Britain has started to surge since the confrontation with the EU.
issues.environment: A healthier environment is a key issue addressed.
issues.health: A better NHS in public hands is one of the focus areas.

housing.content: The party advocates for more affordable housing to improve livelihoods.

contactInformation.address: Eastern Region Green Party, 31 Kensington Place, Norwich, NR1 3JE

quotes.text: The surge in membership has also been echoed in the polls, with the Greens currently polling at record levels and outpolling both of the Lib Dems.

images.caption: Surge in Green Party Membership in the East
Green Policies Among the Most Popular in Britain
